No lo recomiendo, doy aviso de lo toxico que puede llegar a ser la comunidad, llegado a los rangos verdes(nivel de habilidad intermedio) puede ser realmente frustrante, cada vez más premades de genrusher mancos y menos asesinos en el juego, mientras tanto los de Behaviour se siguen chupando las medias entre ellos y oliendo su propios pedos, el juego no es malo(sacando su comunidad asquerosa y pésimo balanceo) en si esta bueno, pero su propia comunidad te echa del mismo.
fun cat and mouse game, you get points for getting objectives and not for winning and losing which helps for getting better then the game.

I love this game! As a person who mainly plays fast fps games, this game is a nice shift to a more relaxing and chill experience. When you first get the game it feels impossible as a survivor; it feels like the killer has ultimate power over you and you will never win. But if you stay at it and learn more about the game, it really becomes enjoyably competitive. 10/10 would recommend to others! :)

After playing this game for two years, I decided to quit DBD because this game is no longer enjoyable for me. Maybe I am an entitled survivor, but I think the killers are getting more and overpowered. First, you have killer use the best add-on and camp at the hook and then tunneling. It is a growing phenomenon that the killer doesn't need to be cunning and smart anymore. This game is getting toxic and drowning. I am tired of fixing gen. I am tired of watching my teammates getting down by low-wit killers. I am tired of getting down by low-wit killers. That's it, after camping by a huntress with iridescent head or  leatherface for like a  100 times..... I uninstall the game.... There are so many fun games out there, don't spend a penny here. It will be a waste of time and money.

Fix hit boxes in the game and survivor needs to be nerfed, its way to easy to keep looping around the same damn thing over and over again, even with bloodlust you can barely catch up unless you are playing some of the most broken killers. If you can not loop you are just bad, people just gen rush and the game is over in an instant if you do not have the most meta perks on killer making it basically pointless to play with anything else. I do not know what they have to do but they need to make it so that the survivors cant keep running from pallet to damn pallet making it impossible to catch up, by the time you are done chasing one kid there is already at least 2 gens done or even three if the survivors know what they are doing. I know there is a huge skill gap from a okay survivor to a good one but it makes it near impossible to win games at a high rank for killer. The match making is also broken, when I was rank 14 I had a rank 1 and 2 survivor in the game. Killer is doesn't feel fun or rewarding it just feels like a chore as the kids just do the damn god loops or normal loops over and over again. Like I stated before killer is only good if you play meta perks and play the most broken ones. There is no chance of winning with low tiers unless the survivors have under 100 hours on the game and are probably brain dead. Hit boxes for the killers attacks are broken though and do need to be fixed. The game just feels so unblalanced. It is either 100 percent survivor favour or killer. Instead of making a mobile app fix the damn game before I tear all my hair out.

Honestly super fun game, sometimes frustrating, and you have to get over a learning curve. But after the fact, really fun, well developed game. I see this as a whole world of oppertunity, and I hope they keep updating it. However, the one thing from the devs that I want inplimented: VR Support. Like OMFG would this game be cool as hell to play in VR. It would make this game perfect for me, and I think it would bring a new level of horror, as the scares fall off after a while. Please BII, bring me my VR! Otherwise, thanks for what you've already given us!

Ok, So this will be unlike any of my other reviews because as much as I love this game, I hate it. There are so many things that make this a really fun and entertaining game but the community and some of the people you will encounter are literally, in a sense, Cancerous. If there was an option to give a mixed review because sure, it's fun but it has many issues with A. The balancing, Nerfs and Buffs *cough cough* You know I'm talking about that nerf to Hex: Ruin B. The community and C. The developer and player contact can either be hit or miss. I love this game as much as I hate it, It's like a Love-Hate relationship that I'll occasionally come back to when an event happens but besides that this game has so many issues. For me this game is like a 6/10. It's a fairly average game but in the right settings and match It's super enjoyable.

かなり前に発売されたにも関わらず未だに多くの人が遊んでいて、最近始めた方も多いので「今から始めても昔からプレイしてるうまい人しかいない」という事はまったくありませんのでセールなので購入を検討されている方にもおすすめできます。
キラー、サバイバーどちらをプレイするにしても人それぞれのプレイスタイルがあったり、毎試合、毎試合で様々なドラマがあり同じゲームがほとんどないので毎マッチ楽しめるのもおすすめポイントです。
マイナス点を挙げるならばクライアントサーバーが貧弱でマッチ失敗やバグっぽ挙動がたまにあるので運営にはその辺の強化をこれからお願いしたいです

Um jogo ótimo, divertido e fácil de se aprender, embora você tenha que gastar uma grande quantia para ter uma variação de personagens o jogo continua igualmente bom, tendo somente um pouco de pay to win

Negativos

O jogo necessita que você gaste uma quantia cosideravelmente alta para ter uma maior variação de boneco, o "balançeador de rank, não é la grande coisa pois se você for um iniciante de assassino tem chance de vir contra sobreviventes de rank 5 ou ate 2, isso acaba estragando um pouco da experiencia do jogo.

Mas fora isso o jogo é ótimo.
